name: Paradise Valley ~ shiny silver highlights in a high twist, soft Merino sock yarn
description:
Individually hand wash cool, dry flat

Silver sparkle in a lush bed of wildflower purples, pinks, lilac, lavender, rose. Inspired by sunset at Paradise valley on Mt. Rainier.

Approximately 430 yards. Delightfully soft and strong HIGH TWIST (SHINY) 2 ply superwash, 75% merino and 20% nylon, 5% silver stellina fingering weight yarn.

Great for socks, baby items, shawls. Strong, soft, and a breeze to wash, with gorgeous depth of color and squishiness. Individually hand dyed in tiny batches, variation from your monitor color may occur. Smoke-free/kitty friendly

name: Breaking Bad ~ self-striping, center pull sock yarn
description:
Jessie, we need to cook.
Nitrile Glove blue
Stainless silver
Hazmat gold-yellow
Respirator black

Center pull ball of self-striping superwash 75% merino, 25% nylon fingering weight yarn,  ~450 yards/100g. 

4 stripes of approximately 3 rows each on average size sock.  There's enough yarn here for 2 average socks, perhaps more!

Individually hand dyed in tiny batches, variation from your monitor color may occur. Smoke-free/kitty friendly

name: $25 Gift Certificate to Intrepid Otter
description:
Don't know what to buy for that special knitter or spinner? Let us help.  You can purchase this gift certificate and have it your way:

1. An email certificate with an immediate use Gift Code to your intended recipient

OR

2. A downloadable PDF to print and give, which has a Gift code for them to use

OR 

3. A nicely printed cardstock Gift Certificate mailed directly to your intended recipient (shipping fee applies). 

After your purchase, we will contact you by email to collect relevant details (recipient's email or address), and you can feel good about a truly unique and customized gift!
